Uses of Class
nl.naturalis.common.Check

  • Packages that use Check 
    Package Description
    nl.naturalis.common
    Contains various static method utility classes for working with strings, arrays, collections, etc.
    nl.naturalis.common.internal

      Verifies that the argument is between minInclusive and maxExclusive.

      Verifies that the argument is between minInclusive and maxInclusive.

      Verifies that the argument is empty.

      Verifies that the argument is less than maxVal.

      Check<T,​E> Check.test​(boolean condition, String message, Object... msgArgs)
      Verifies that the specified condition (supposedly related to the argument) evaluates to true.
      static Check<Integer,​IllegalArgumentException> Check.that​(int arg, String argName)
      Returns a Check instance for int arguments, throwing an IllegalArgumentException if the argument fails to pass a test.
      static <F extends Exception>

      Returns a Check object for int arguments, throwing a custom exception if the argument fails to pass a test.
      static <U> Check<U,​IllegalArgumentException> Check.that​(U arg, String argName)
